short_description: Arduino-controlled milkshake machine with mobile app interface
long_description: A smart milkshake-making machine controlled by Arduino Mega and NodeMCU. It allows users to select ingredients via a mobile app or keypad, and prepares milkshakes with an automated dispensing, blending, and cup-serving system.

short_description: Web and mobile platform for university housing management
long_description: A web and mobile system that allows students to apply for university housing, select rooms, track application status, and communicate with admins. Admins can manage room allocations, messages, and complaints.

short_description: Platform for managing aid distribution for NGOs
long_description: An aid distribution platform for managing requests and donations for food, clothing, and medicine. Built to streamline NGO workflows and ensure fair delivery using real-time status tracking and notifications.
